title: LED Ultra-Thin Under Wireless Cabinet Light, Warm White 3000K Montion Sensor Closet Light, 80 LEDs with 1500MA Battery, USB Powered Rechargeable Cabinet Light for Cabinet, Wardrobe, Closet, Kitchen
features: üîÜ„ÄêBright & Natural Lighting„Äë80 LEDs provide flicker-free, bright, and natural lighting that won't harm your eyes or disturb others in the dark. Illuminate dark areas in your home with ease.

üîÜ„Äê2 Modes to Choose From„ÄëChoose between induction motion sensor mode, which automatically turns on within 10 feet when it detects human movement in the dark, and constant light mode for long-lasting lighting. Customize your lighting experience to your needs.

üîÜ„ÄêEasy to Install„ÄëWith a built-in magnet, this under cabinet light can be easily adhered to any iron product and installed or removed without any tools or wiring. Move it around your home as needed.

üîÜ„ÄêRechargeable & Energy-Efficient„ÄëThe built-in 1500mA rechargeable battery can be easily charged via USB and lasts up to 5 hours under on mode and 1-2 months under motion sensor mode. Save money and never replace AAA batteries again.

üîÜ„ÄêWide Application & 1-Year Warranty„ÄëPerfect for bedrooms, closets, cabinets, workshops, garages, stairwells, corridors, basements, storage rooms, and more. Backed by a 1-year warranty and excellent customer support.
description: 1. Automatic sensor: Lights will be on when human body is detected, be off 15 seconds later when no human body is detected.
2. Sensor mode will not start when the environment is bright.
3. Using:More than 20% power, indicator lights are off 20% power, 1 indicator light is on.1-15% power, 1 indicator light flashes. 0% power, light off, 4 indicator lights flash for 3-5 seconds.
Fully Charged: 4 Indicator lights on, no flashing.
